name: Jumping Frog on Helix Tower
description:
Free easy handling game, simply slide your fingers to turn the helix tower. The frog jumps alone, dodges blue leaves and blue obstacles.

Benefits and recommendations:

* Take the frog through the labyrinth of leaves to its pond
* Use the powerups for a bigger jump to go down fast across the helix tower.
* Use the magic balls to break more leaves and get immunity
* Fantastic special effects and good music
